name: The City Is Yours
description:
The City Is Yours

In The city is yours you take on the role as a gangster who's goal it is to take over the city. Build a crew, extort storeowners, send out robbers and burglars, hire hitmen, bribe the police and take out your rival with any force needed. You can even run a campaign to become mayor of the city. The city is yours is a text-based mafia simulation game where picking the right strategy is the key to victory.

Download the .bat file on this page or: Download it here
